metadata.title: CVE-2022-0436 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - high.
metadata.description:
Path Traversal in GitHub repository gruntjs/grunt prior to 1.5.2.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-0436` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

grunt - 1.5.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: grunt package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.3-1').
